casebody.data:
Harry J. LAFFERTY, Michael D. Kirn, Robert T. Kirn, John J. Roedell, John M. Ferris, and Robert F. Ferris, Petitioners
v.
Thomas D. FERRIS, Respondent No. 878 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. May 15, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 15th day of May, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
